homeTopText: Jump-start your career and get over your fear

category.title: Weekly Office Hour
category.description: Submit your questions and gain valuable insights from experienced mentors during our weekly 30-minute panel sessions. Discover practical tips for overcoming workplace challenges and learn how to become a positive asset to your boss, colleagues, and organization.

category.title: Focus Group
category.description: Be part of a mentor-led discussion group where you'll learn how to live out your purpose and make your work life count.

category.title: Project Transformation
category.description: Become a catalyst for positive change—transform your workplace and empower others to do the same.

category.title: CCE Class
category.description: Designed for students in grades 8-12, this program teaches 12 life-changing capabilities—including listening accurately, asking thoughtful questions, and navigating failure—that support both college readiness and long-term career success.

category.title: CCE Webinar
category.description: Program Launch, Career Journey Exploration (various career paths including medical, investment banking, finance-technology, architecture, trading industry...)

category.title: Our Team
category.description: Rooted in the spirit of giving and receiving—get to know the team behind the mission.

category.title: CCE Chronicle
category.description: Gain valuable insights from interviews conducted by our Chronicle team of college students.

category.title: Interview Training (Eagle Wing)
category.description: Build the confidence you need to excel in high-pressure job interviews.

category.title: Internship (Soaring Eagle)
category.description: Gain hands-on experience through projects valued by the industry, guided by mentorship from seasoned professionals.

homeWhoDes: We are a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization dedicated to providing a comprehensive support system that empowers individuals to grow and thrive through every stage of their career journey.
homeWhatDes: We build a healthy ecosystem of "giving and receiving" where people of all ages can build a healthy career through mentorship.
homeHowDes: Career (re)launch (internship, interview training), career development mentorship (CCE class, office hour, focus group...)
joinDes1: Enter your email to receive updates on our activities and events!
joinDes2: Regardless of your skills or experience, you can make a lasting impact through the CCE community!
